summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly higher on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 01
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly higher on Wednesday, with 14 gaining and four declining.
Bitcoin rose 2% to $23,574 by market close.
